# The xml extension

This extension provides support for parsing XML.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_XML

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_XML_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.

### PHP_EXT_XML_EXPAT

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds xml extension with the Expat library support instead of the libxml2.
